cause.description:
The new Art4Change Canvas is a painting being made in near real-time on the Tom Schreiber Studio homepage at www.tomschreiber.com Enjoy exploring the new canvas in the coming weeks as it develops with new input from people across the country and around the world. Sponsor a square to express yourself and be a part of the painting, "Canvas I", 2008-2009. Make payment easily through PayPal. Your square will be created and linked to an online destination of your choice.
Donate to the NRDC here - additionally I'll send 10% of the money earned from square sales in the painting to NRDC to support their efforts in safeguarding our planet.
Thanks to everybody who has participated in this so far and welcome to all of the new people.
cheers! -tom
-- Tom Schreiber Studio Become a part of a changing eARTh at http://www.tomschreiber.com
Share the Art4Change NRDC Cause on Facebook! http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/9073
1. Art can be great fun
2. So can doing good things for our earth
3. ...So why not find a way to combine them because people like to do good things that are also fun
cause.mission: A little art benefit project for the NRDC -one of my favortite groups working on keeping our planet healthy for present and future generations
cause.name: Art4Change: I Support the eARTh we live on!
